comment.author: 39448179@N00
comment._content: Awesome picture of my Grandfather. I had no idea he was so handsome :)

comment.author: 21516241@N06
comment._content: My mom has two Guy C Wiggins winter scenes that have been gracing her wall for over 20 years.  Not a day goes by that I don't spend a moment in awe of his work.   What great talent beginning with his handsome grandfather and then passed into the third generation.  Possibly four generations.  I wish his son who is also a great fine artist a long a peaceful life.  Guy A paintings, like his father and grandfather are simply breathtaking.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/21516241@N06] Hello there, eyeonlife!  It's so kind of you to share your story and experience with us.  Really brings this portrait to life. 

Sincerely, 

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives
